name: Fuelmii
slogan: Fuelmii has ''uberised'' fuel in the UK - never have to visit a forecourt ever again!
description:
Fuelmii/ Fuelmii Fleet is not just a fuel delivery service, it's a partnership - we've created the first mobile fuel station to help your business save time and money.

We provide business and individuals unbeatable prices on fuel with all the efficiencies for free!

team.name: Tuguy Dervish
team.bioHtml: Founder and CEO of Fuelmii - The UK's favourite mobile fuel delivery service

jobs.title: Commercial Sales Executive and Account Manager
jobs.description:
To keep this short and sweet - you will be at the forefront of an organisation leading the disruption of mobile fuelling.

We are looking for someone driven and ambitious and to be honest someone we can all get along with. It is not about numbers but about personality!

Fuelmii has a special way of dealing with clients and you will be at the forefront of dealing with worldwide brands that we work with.


- Achieve growth and hit sales targets by successfully managing your clients
- Design and implement a strategic business plan that expands company’s customer base and ensure it’s strong presence
- Build and promote strong, long-lasting customer relationships by partnering with them and understanding their needs
- Present sales, revenue and expenses reports and realistic forecasts to the management team
- Identify emerging markets and market shifts while being fully aware of new products and competition status

We are happy to give you all the  ''nitty gritty'' information once we have a chat. 

Apply today to find out more and be at the forefront of something revolutionary.
